hero.headline: Unleash the Ultimate Gaming Experience.
hero.intro: The fastest gaming performance. Unmatched processing power. Superior WiFi technology.

performance.headline: Fastest Gaming Performance
list: Gigabit CPU, Gigabit wired, and Gigabit WiFi, ready for 4K gaming
A gaming beast with the most advanced WiFi technology gives you unparalleled speed
Compete with other gamers, not other devices. Dynamic Quality of Service (QoS) intelligently prioritizes video streaming and gaming

power.headline: Unmatched Processing Power
list: Industry’s fastest processor at 1.7GHz keeps network performance at its ultimate level – no lag, no CPU hogs, no excuses!
Dual-core processor helps dedicate processing power for network traffic and provides lowest-latency experience for all those online games
Plenty (512MB) of memory to connect as many devices as you want for uncompromised performance that won’t miss a beat

technology.headline: Superior WiFi Technology
list: Reach every corner of the house with powerful amplifiers, beamforming+, and 4 high performance external antennas
With fastest MU-MIMO performance per PC Magazine, a perfect match for MU-MIMO capable gaming devices such as Alienware 13, 15, and 17
Industry’s first 160MHz radio enables Nighthawk® X4S to double the bandwidth working with 160MHz enabled devices for lower latency
